entry.title: Women’s Sauna Jacket/Jogger Combo
entry.summary:
Vendor: NonZero Gravity
Type: Sauna Suits
Price: 85.00

  • Boosts weight loss by increasing caloric output
  • Improves muscle performance by increasing internal muscle temperature
  • Prevents skin irritation with flat-lock stitching and mesh underarm design
  • Reflective logo on jacket for safety in low-light situations
  • Spacious zipper pockets in the jacket and joggers to carry workout essentials
  • Joggers come with tapered fit and interior drawstring

Long used by professional fighters to cut weight and increase muscle mass, sauna suits like the Women’s Sauna Jacket/Jogger combo were developed to give you an extra tool to reach your fitness goals. The sleek, athleisure-style design allows you to go from the office to the gym without having to lug around any extra workout gear.

Material: 100% Neoprene

Care: Hand wash in cold water only. Air dry away from direct sunlight. Do not dry clean, iron or tumble dry.

entry.title: Women’s Sauna Hoodie/Jogger Combo
entry.summary:
Vendor: NonZero Gravity
Type: Sauna Suits
Price: 100.00

  • Boosts weight loss by increasing caloric output
  • Improves muscle performance by increasing internal muscle temperature
  • Neoprene material with flat-lock stitching and mesh underarm design prevent skin irritation
  • Hoodie has a unisex, no-frills design with a slightly tapered fit and reflective logo
  • Joggers have two zipper pockets to carry workout essentials
  • Joggers come with tapered fit and interior drawstring

The Women’s Sauna Hoodie/Jogger combo was developed specifically to give you an extra tool in your weight loss and fitness journey. Suits like these have long been used by professional fighters to cut weight before an event, but now you can capitalize on their benefits as well. The trendy designs and tapered fit means you can wear this combo inside and outside of the gym without worrying about having to carry around extra workout gear.

Material: 100% Neoprene

Care: Hand wash in cold water only. Air dry away from direct sunlight. Do not dry clean, iron or tumble dry.
